subject: Football
lead_paragraph: Two of the first three picks in the April draft will make their N.F.L. debuts, when Reggie Bush and the Saints play their exhibition opener against Vince Young and the Tennessee Titans.
snippet: Two of the first three picks in the April draft will make their N.F.L. debuts, when Reggie Bush and the Saints play their exhibition opener against Vince Young and the Tennessee Titans.
